title: Coinbase-Incubated Base Suffers Outage, Team Says 'No Funds Are at Risk'
description: The outage prompted dozens of comparisons to other blockchain solutions and their relative stability.

title: $XRP Token Holders To Be Able to Earn On-Chain Income with Proposed Amendment
description: The XRP Ledger (XRPL) could soon receive an upgrade, the highly-anticipated XLS-30d amendment, which would introduce a built-in automated market maker (AMM) trading platform into the ledger, allowing $XRP token holders to earn income on-chain. An AMM is a platform that allows for cryptocurrency trading in a permissionless way using liquidity pools, rather than traditional [â€¦]
